Instruction: Heat a skillet over medium heat.
Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place one slice of bread, butter side down, in the skillet.
Layer cheese on top of the bread slice in the skillet.
Top with the other slice of bread, butter side up.
Cook until golden brown on one side, then flip and cook until the cheese is melted and both sides are golden brown.
Remove from the skillet, cut in half if desired, and serve.
